name: DownloadPackage
description: Download a package from a package management feed in Azure Artifacts
helpMarkDown: Requires the Package Management extension to be installed
author: ms-vscs-rm
releaseNotes: Adds support to download Maven, Python, Universal and Npm packages.

inputs.name: view
inputs.label: View
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select a view to use only versions promoted to that view.

inputs.name: definition
inputs.label: Package
inputs.helpMarkDown: If you don't find the package in the list, you can provide the package ID, which you can find using the instructions [here](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2086778).

inputs.name: files
inputs.label: Files
inputs.visibleRule: packageType = maven || packageType = pypi || packageType = upack
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify which files to download using [file matching patterns](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2086953).

inputs.name: extract
inputs.label: Extract package contents
inputs.helpMarkDown: Instead of extracting the package contents and removing the archive, the artifact folder will contain the package archive.

inputs.name: downloadPath
inputs.label: Destination directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path on the agent machine where the package will be downloaded
